mapper.select: SELECT meter.MDS_ID AS meterId , cust.customerNo AS customerId , cust.name AS customerName , cont.contract_Number AS geocode , cust.address2 AS address , cont.lastTokenDate AS lastChargeDate , stat.descr AS supplyState , cont.currentCredit AS credit , cont.currentArrears AS arrears , debt.amount AS debtTotal FROM Contract cont LEFT OUTER JOIN Customer cust on cont.CUSTOMER_ID = cust.id LEFT OUTER JOIN (select customer_id,sum(debt_amount) as amount from WS_CMS_DEBTENT where debt_status != 'CANCEL' group by customer_id) debt on cust.customerNo = debt.customer_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Meter meter on cont.meter_id = meter.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Modem modem on meter.modem_id = modem.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Mcu mcu on modem.mcu_id = mcu.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Code stat on cont.status_id = stat.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Code credit on cont.credittype_id = credit.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Code tariff on cont.tariffIndex_id = tariff.id

SELECT CONT.CONTRACT_NUMBER AS geocode , CONT.CURRENTCREDIT AS credit , CUST.ADDRESS2 AS address , CONT.LASTTOKENDATE AS lastChargeDate , CUST.CUSTOMERNO AS customerId , CUST.NAME AS customerName , CUST.MOBILENUMBER AS mobileNumber , STAT.DESCR AS supplyState , CONT.CURRENTARREARS AS arrears , DEBT.AMOUNT AS debtTotal FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUST ON CONT.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CUSTOMER_ID,SUM(DEBT_AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM WS_CMS_DEBTENT WHERE DEBT_STATUS != 'CANCEL' GROUP BY CUSTOMER_ID) DEBT ON CUST.CUSTOMERNO = DEBT.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MODEM MODEM ON METER.MODEM_ID = MODEM.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCU MCU ON MODEM.MCU_ID = MCU.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE STAT ON CONT.STATUS_ID = STAT.ID

SELECT METER.MDS_ID AS METERID , CUST.NAME AS customerName , CUST.MOBILENUMBER AS mobileNumber FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUST ON CONT.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID
